question: ou need to take leave from your work for almost a month for some personal reasons. Write a letter to your Manager. In your letter: • Explain the reason for your leave & the length of your leave. • Explain how you intend to deliver the task that was given to you recently and has to be turned in in a week’s time. • Explain how & who will look after your work while you are away.
text: I am writing this letter to you to inform you about my new situation which lead to asking for taking leave.

Firstly, I should say I have an old grandmother who lives with me. Last week I found she could not eat any food, so, Set an appointment with her doctor, he said, she needed  emergency surgery because of heart, so, I was staying since two days ago at the hospital. On the other hand,  she had not any children I have to be accompanied her for one month.
As you know, I am working in the accounting section. Currently, all documents are ready and I do not have any backlog tasks therefore, I can deliver my duty conveniently.

On the other hand, I tried to learn all my duty from my colleague Roohi, fortunately, she has done this task before recent her promotion, so she knows all sections of transactions.and because of my situation, she accepts to do my task.
Finally,Thank you for taking your time and your consideration of my letter.
